javadoc:
A listener interface to know when a component has been 
 made {@link Component#isDisplayable() displayable}

methods.name: componentLoaded
methods.comment: Called when the component is made displayable

params.name: windowManager
params.comment: the window manager associated with the loaded component

params.name: provider
params.comment:
the provider that is the parent of the given component; null if this
        component is not the child of a component provider

name: ComponentLoadedListener
comment:
A listener interface to know when a component has been 
 made Component#isDisplayable()
